entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump And you:
- said “hundreds” of governors called you
- used a sharpie on a map so you didn’t have to say you were wrong
- said our 15 Coronavirus cases would quickly go down to zero
- golf while people die
- asked several foreign governments to interfere in our election 
#Biden2020
